Posts.Content: I noticed along my rib in the middle of both breast I hAVE A LUMP ON MY RIBS ITS ON BOTH SIDES BUT IS MUCH more prominent on the left side..is this normal anatomy or something I should be concerned about? it is smooth all around and feels like it is part of my rib..there is no seperate lump only a round feeling..my mom felt it and said it was my rib but I don't remember it being that prominent..
Posts.Title: knobby bump on rib along bra line

Posts.Content: I am pregnant and also have significant pain in one breast..it is tender all along the area around my underarm to the bottom..I am also getting worried..it's so tender it feels bruised..I also have a swollen lymph node under my arm..my ob/gyn has done nothing saying the tenderness is from pregnancy and the lymph node from shaving..
Posts.Title: Sharp pain in breasts

Posts.Content: I am currently pregnant and noticed 2 months ago a swollen loop that goes around my nipple on my areola..it comes and goes through out the day..I have asked my ob/gyn and 2 breast surgeons and no one is concerned..it wasn't that visable at the time I was examined because if I get cold and my nipple shrivels up it goes away..I also have had a slightly swollen gland under my armpit on the same side..they just say it is not that big and is reactive..no one even offered an ultrasound..I am worried sick I have breast cancer..I can't even enjoy my pregnancy
Posts.Title: weird swelling on areola

Posts.Content: I have the same symptoms..if you look under the lymphoma I posted about the groin lymph nodes....mine have been enlarged for 6 weeks now about the size of kidney beans..I also looked up online and found the same thing vulva cancer..are your's along your bikini line? how long have they been there?
Posts.Title: Lumps in odd places
